name: PowerCards Macro Helper
description:
Companion Script to **PowerCards**. Automatically creates character attributes and macros to allow for system-generated PowerCards based on compendium/custom entered NPC Actions and Player Attacks.

 * [PowerCard Macro Helper Documentation](https://wiki.roll20.net/Script:PowerCards_Macro_Helper)
* [PowerCards & Macro Helper forum thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/7136858/script-powercards-3-thread-6)
